seller_research.name: Whatfix
seller_research.description: Whatfix is an Indian SaaS-based digital adoption platform that provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software.

pricing_models.type: Flat fee plus user license fees
pricing_models.description: Whatfix pricing is based on two components: a flat per-application fee, plus user license fees.
pricing_models.duration: Annual billing, term length varies based on contract

pricing_models.description: Whatfix offers a free plan with 30 credits.
Whatfix offers a basic plan at $39 per month.

buyer_research.name: Automation Anywhere
buyer_research.description: Automation Anywhere is a leader in intelligent automation solutions that put artificial intelligence (AI) to work across every aspect of an organization.

competitors.name: Pendo
pros: helps software companies develop products that resonate with customers
offers a wide range of tools

pains: How can Whatfix help Automation Anywhere increase efficiency and reduce costs?
Whatfix's pricing model may not be suitable for our large-scale operations
Integrating Whatfix with our existing RPA tools might be challenging
We are unsure about the scalability of Whatfix's digital adoption platform
How does Whatfix handle complex workflows and multifaceted software adoption?
We are concerned about the level of customization required to implement Whatfix
Our existing manual processes may not be easily automated by Whatfix
objections: We have already invested heavily in our current RPA tools, switching to Whatfix may not be feasible
Whatfix may not have the necessary expertise in our industry (RPA)
The ROI of implementing Whatfix may not be immediately clear
We are hesitant to adopt a new digital adoption platform with uncertain results
Whatfix's flat fee plus user license fees pricing model may not be cost-effective for us
We are unsure about the level of support and training provided by Whatfix

messages.content: Hello, thank you for taking the time to speak with me today. My name is [Sales Person's Name] and I'm a sales representative from Whatfix. Could you please introduce yourself and your role at Automation Anywhere?
Hi, I'm Rohan, a senior automation specialist at Automation Anywhere. I'm responsible for identifying and implementing process automation solutions across our organization.
Great to meet you, Rohan! Can you tell me a bit more about your current role and what your goals are for the next quarter?

Currently, I'm focused on increasing efficiency and reducing costs across our organization. We've been relying heavily on manual processes, which are taking up a lot of time and resources. In the next quarter, I'd like to see a significant reduction in our manual process workload and a shift towards more automation.

I completely understand. It sounds like you're looking to drive more efficiency and productivity within your organization. Have you considered implementing a digital adoption platform to help accelerate your automation goals?
Actually, yes. We've been exploring different options, but we're not sure which platform would be the best fit for our needs. We've heard about Whatfix, but we're not familiar with it.

Well, Whatfix is a digital adoption platform that provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software. We've worked with several organizations in the RPA space to help them drive user adoption and maximize their technology investments. Can I walk you through how our platform can help achieve your goals?
Yes, please. I'd love to learn more about how Whatfix can help us.

Our platform uses AI-powered guides to help users navigate complex software applications, ensuring that they're getting the most out of their technology investments. We also provide real-time analytics to help you track user adoption and identify areas for improvement. What are some of the specific pain points you're experiencing with your current manual processes?

Well, one of the biggest challenges we face is the lack of scalability. Our current manual processes are not designed to handle the volume of automation we're aiming for. We're also concerned about the level of customization required to implement a new digital adoption platform.

I completely understand. Scalability is a top concern for many of our customers. Whatfix is designed to scale with your organization, and our implementation process is tailored to meet your specific needs. We've worked with several large-scale organizations to help them achieve their automation goals. Can I address some of the concerns you have about customization?
Yes, please. We're worried that we'll need to invest a lot of time and resources into customizing the platform to fit our needs.

I understand your concern. Whatfix offers a high degree of customization, but we also provide a dedicated implementation team to help you get up and running quickly. We've developed a proven implementation methodology that ensures a seamless integration with your existing systems. We've also got a wide range of out-of-the-box integrations with popular RPA tools.
That sounds promising. What kind of ROI can we expect from implementing Whatfix?

Our customers typically see a significant reduction in their manual process workload within the first few months of implementation. We've also seen a significant increase in user adoption and productivity. I can provide you with some case studies and ROI data from similar organizations if you'd like.
Yes, that would be great. We'd love to see some concrete examples of how Whatfix has helped other organizations achieve their automation goals.

I'll send those over to you by the end of the day. In the meantime, I'd like to discuss the decision-making process and timeline for implementing a digital adoption platform. Can you walk me through who else would be involved in this decision and what your timeline looks like?
Our CTO, Mihir Shukla, would ultimately be the one making the decision. We're hoping to make a decision within the next 6-8 weeks.
Got it. I'll make sure to keep that timeline in mind. Are there any other competitors or solutions you're considering at this time?
Yes, we're also looking at WalkMe and Pendo. We've heard good things about both platforms, but we're not sure which one would be the best fit for our needs.

I'm happy to provide you with a detailed comparison of our platform vs. WalkMe and Pendo. I think Whatfix would be a great fit for your organization, but I want to make sure you have all the information you need to make an informed decision. Is there anything else you'd like to discuss or any questions you have about Whatfix?
No, I think that covers everything. Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today. I'll look forward to receiving the case studies and ROI data.
You're welcome, Rohan. It was great speaking with you. I'll send over the additional information by the end of the day and follow up with you next week to answer any further questions you may have.

pain_points: level of customization required to implement a new digital adoption platform
objections: concerns about the level of customization required
success_indicators: increase in user adoption and productivity

objection_resolution_pairs.resolution: Whatfix offers a high degree of customization, but we also provide a dedicated implementation team to help you get up and running quickly.
Whatfix is a digital adoption platform that provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software.

insights: Automation Anywhere is looking to drive more efficiency and productivity within their organization.
They are currently relying heavily on manual processes, which are taking up a lot of time and resources.
They are exploring different digital adoption platforms to help accelerate their automation goals.
improvements: Need to provide more information about Whatfix's customization capabilities and implementation process.
Should provide more clarity on how Whatfix can help Automation Anywhere achieve their goals and success indicators.
